name: wongsang Worldwide
overview:
WHAT WE DO The explosive growth of social media means most of our clients now recognize the need to create, distribute and measure shareable brand content – not just in campaign lifecycles, but all the time. We’ve optimized our agency to help clients do this and accurately measure the impact on business results. Put simply, we connect storytelling to data.

HOW WE DO IT We’ve spent years learning how to blend different talents and expertise into one unified culture to help our clients achieve their goals. However, engaging audiences with compelling content across bought, owned and earned media, on multiple devices, has reached a level of complexity that is virtually unmanageable by current means. This is where the www Audience Engagement Platform (AEP) comes in. Witness the power of the Wongsang worldwide Audience Engagement Platform Our proprietary technology and associated expert services work together to solve this complexity. They help us gain insights that inform the content we create, and the audiences we are trying to reach. The AEP enables the management, workflow, distribution, measurement and optimization of content in virtually any form, across multiple content platforms, globally. With this proprietary suite of tools, we can engage with advocates, influencers, customers and the multiple signals that influence them and the content they care about. Enabling Wongsang worldwide to have ‘conversations’ on behalf of our clients’ brands on a global scale, while reducing costs to manage and deploy.
